DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of study is to: 1) determine critical volume necessary to overcome tubal pressure and result in fluid dissemination and 2) evaluate functional viability of any disseminated tumor cells collected during SHG
DOC.brief_title: Disseminated Endometrial Cancer Cells During Sonohysterography
DOC.criteria: Stage I endometrial Cancer Disease State IIA endometrial Cancer Disease Prior tubal ligation Prior bilateral salpingectomy
